original.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Auto enable OCR workaround (enable automatic OCR workaround for heavily scanned documents)
original.Character pattern to identify formula te: Character pattern to identify formula text (regex, not recommended to change)
original.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Disable rich text translation (maybe improve compatibility)
original.Effective only when a page range is spec: Effective only when a page range is specified.
original.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Font pattern to identify formula text (regex, not recommended to change)
original.Force split short lines into different p: Force split short lines into different paragraphs
original.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Handle alternating line numbers and text paragraphs in documents with line numbers
original.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used as the number of workers
original.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: IoU threshold for identifying non-formula lines
original.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Maximum number of requests processed simultaneously
original.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Maximum pages per part (for auto-split translation, 0 means no limit)
original.Most API providers provide this paramete: Most API providers provide this parameter, such as OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
original.Number of requests sent per second: Number of requests sent per second
original.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR workaround (experimental, will auto enable Skip scanned detection in backend)
original.Only include translated pages in the out: Only include translated pages in the output PDF.
original.Primary font family for translated text: Primary font family for translated text
original.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Protection threshold for figures and tables (lines within figures/tables will not be processed)
original.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Put translated pages first in dual mode
original.RPC service for document layout analysis: RPC service for document layout analysis (optional)
original.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Remove non-formula lines within paragraph areas
original.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Select the rate limit mode that best suits your API provider, system will automatically convert the rate limiting values of RPM or Concurrent Requests to QPS and Pool Max Workers when you click the Translate button
original.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Skip formula offset calculation during processing
original.Split threshold factor for short lines: Split threshold factor for short lines
original.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Use alternating pages for dual PDF
original.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.

zh.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同时处理的最大请求数量
zh.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 每部分最大页数（用于自动拆分翻译，0 表示无限制）
zh.Effective only when a page range is spec: 仅在指定页面范围时生效
zh.Force split short lines into different p: 强制将短行分割为不同段落
zh.Only include translated pages in the out: 仅在输出的 PDF 中包含翻译后的页面。
zh.Download automatically extracted glossar: 下载自动提取的术语表
zh.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 在双栏模式下优先显示翻译页面
zh.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 增强兼容性（自动启用 skip_clean 和 disable_rich_text）
zh.Character pattern to identify formula te: 用于识别公式文本的字符模式（正则表达式，不建议更改）
zh.Most API providers provide this paramete: 大多数 API 提供商都提供此参数，例如 OpenAI GPT-4:500 RPM
zh.Translate table text (experimental): 翻译表格文本（实验性功能）
zh.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非公式行 IoU 阈值
zh.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): 跳过清理（可能提高兼容性）
zh.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 用于识别非公式行的 IoU 阈值
zh.RPC service for document layout analysis: 文档布局分析的 RPC 服务（可选）
zh.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: 自动启用 OCR 变通方案（为重度扫描文档启用自动 OCR 变通方案）
zh.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 用于识别公式文本的字体模式（正则表达式，不建议更改）
zh.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 如果未设置或设置为 0，QPS 将用作工作线程数
zh.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 移除段落区域内的非公式行
zh.Free translation service provided by [Si: 免费翻译服务由 [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn) 提供
zh.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 处理带行号文档中的交替行号与文本段落
zh.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 处理过程中跳过公式偏移计算
zh.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 图表保护阈值（图表内的内容将不会被处理）
zh.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: 使用交替页面进行双页 PDF
zh.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 禁用富文本翻译（可能提升兼容性）
zh.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 变通方案（实验性，将自动在后端启用跳过扫描检测）
zh.save automatically extracted glossary: 保存自动提取的术语表
zh.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: 请选择最适合您 API 提供商的速率限制模式，当您点击沉浸式翻译按钮时，系统会自动将 RPM 或并发请求的限流值转换为 QPS 和池最大工作线程数。
zh.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.

zh-TW.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 停用富文本翻譯（可能提升相容性）
zh-TW.Effective only when a page range is spec: 僅在指定頁面範圍時有效
zh-TW.Download automatically extracted glossar: 下載自動提取的詞彙表
zh-TW.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同時處理的最大請求數量
zh-TW.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 增強相容性 (自動啟用 skip_clean 和 disable_rich_text)
zh-TW.Only include translated pages in the out: 僅在輸出 PDF 中包含已翻譯的頁面。
zh-TW.Force split short lines into different p: 強制將短行分割為不同段落
zh-TW.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 每部分最大頁數（用於自動分割翻譯，0 表示無限制）
zh-TW.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 處理文件中交替的行號與文字段落（含行號的文件）
zh-TW.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 用於識別公式文字的字型模式（正則表達式，不建議更改）
zh-TW.Character pattern to identify formula te: 識別公式文字的字元模式（正則表達式，不建議更改）
zh-TW.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: 自動啟用 OCR 解決方案（針對高度掃描的文件啟用自動 OCR 解決方案）
zh-TW.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非公式線條 IoU 閾值
zh-TW.Primary font family for translated text: 翻譯文字的主要字型家族
zh-TW.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 在雙重模式下優先顯示翻譯頁面
zh-TW.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 解決方案 (實驗性，後端將自動啟用跳過掃描檢測)
zh-TW.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 圖表和表格的保護閾值（圖表/表格內的線條將不被處理）
zh-TW.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): 跳過清理（可能提高相容性）
zh-TW.RPC service for document layout analysis: 用於文件版面分析的 RPC 服務（可選）
zh-TW.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 移除段落區域內的非公式行
zh-TW.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 若未設定或設為 0，將使用 QPS 作為工作執行緒數量
zh-TW.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
zh-TW.save automatically extracted glossary: 儲存自動提取的詞彙表
zh-TW.Translate table text (experimental): 翻譯表格文字（實驗性功能）
zh-TW.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 用於識別非公式線條的 IoU 閾值
zh-TW.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 處理期間跳過公式偏移計算
zh-TW.Most API providers provide this paramete: 大多數 API 提供商都提供此參數，例如 OpenAI GPT-4:500 RPM
zh-TW.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: 選擇最適合您 API 供應商的速率限制模式，當您點擊轉換按鈕時，系統會自動將 RPM 或並發請求的速率限制值轉換為 QPS 和池最大工作線程數
zh-TW.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: 使用交替頁面進行雙頁 PDF

ja.Custom prompt for the translator: 翻訳者用のカスタムプロンプト
ja.Disable monolingual output: 単一言語出力を無効にする
ja.Document Preview: ドキュメントプレビュー
ja.Disable bilingual output: バイリンガル出力を無効にする
ja.Force split short lines into different p: 短い行を強制的に別の段落に分割する
ja.Effective only when a page range is spec: ページ範囲が指定されている場合にのみ有効です。
ja.Download Translation (Mono): 翻訳をダウンロード（モノ）
ja.Custom prompt for translation: 翻訳用のカスタムプロンプト
ja.Custom System Prompt: カスタムシステムプロンプト
ja.Minimum text length to translate: 翻訳する最小テキスト長
ja.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 行番号付き文書における行番号とテキスト段落の交互処理
ja.Download automatically extracted glossar: 自動抽出された用語集をダウンロード
ja.Maximum number of requests processed sim: 同時に処理する最大リクエスト数
ja.Put translated pages first in dual mode: デュアルモードでは翻訳ページを優先表示
ja.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: リッチテキスト翻訳を無効にする（互換性が向上する可能性あり）
ja.Non-formula line IoU threshold: 非公式ラインの IoU 閾値
ja.Number of requests sent per second: 1 秒あたりのリクエスト送信数
ja.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 互換性を向上（skip_clean と disable_rich_text を自動で有効化）
ja.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 設定されていない場合、または 0 に設定されている場合、QPS がワーカー数として使用されます
ja.Only include translated pages in the out: 出力 PDF には翻訳済みのページのみを含めてください。
ja.Ignore cache: キャッシュを無視する
ja.Character pattern to identify formula te: 数式テキストを識別するための文字パターン（正規表現、変更は推奨されません）
ja.Download Translation (Dual): 翻訳をダウンロード（デュアル）
ja.Skip scanned detection: スキャン検出をスキップ
ja.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 数式テキストを識別するためのフォントパターン（正規表現、変更は非推奨）
ja.RPC service for document layout analysis: 文書レイアウト分析用 RPC サービス（オプション）
ja.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 図表の保護閾値（図表内の行は処理されません）
ja.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: OCR 自動回避策を有効にする（スキャン文書が多い場合に自動で OCR 回避策を適用）
ja.Primary font family for translated text: 翻訳テキストの主要フォントファミリー
ja.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 段落エリア内の非数式行を削除
ja.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 最大ページ数/パート（自動分割翻訳用、0 は無制限を意味します）
ja.Disable auto extract glossary: 自動用語集抽出を無効にする
ja.Pool Max Workers: プール最大ワーカー数
ja.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: デュアル PDF には交互ページを使用
ja.RPM (Requests Per Minute): RPM (1 分あたりのリクエスト数)
ja.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 回避策（実験的、バックエンドでスキャンされた文書の検出をスキップを自動的に有効にします）
ja.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): クリーンをスキップ（互換性が向上する可能性あり）
ja.Free translation service provided by [Si: [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn) が提供する無料翻訳サービス
ja.Skip formula offset calculation: 数式オフセット計算をスキップ
ja.Translate table text (experimental): 表のテキストを翻訳（実験的機能）
ja.Split threshold factor for short lines: 短い行の分割しきい値係数
ja.save automatically extracted glossary: 自動抽出された用語集を保存
ja.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 非数式行を識別するための IoU 閾値
ja.Most API providers provide this paramete: ほとんどの API プロバイダーはこのパラメータを提供しています。例えば OpenAI GPT-4 の場合：500 RPM
ja.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
ja.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 処理中に数式オフセット計算をスキップする
ja.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: API プロバイダーに最適なレートリミットモードを選択してください。没入型翻訳ボタンをクリックすると、システムが RPM または同時リクエスト数のレート制限値を QPS およびプール最大ワーカー数に自動的に変換します。

ko.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: 호환성 향상 (skip_clean 및 disable_rich_text 자동 활성화)
ko.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: 서식 있는 텍스트 번역 비활성화 (호환성 향상 가능)
ko.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: 자동 OCR 해결 방법 활성화 (스캔이 많이 된 문서에 대해 자동 OCR 해결 방법을 활성화합니다)
ko.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: 파트당 최대 페이지 수 (자동 분할 번역용, 0 은 제한 없음)
ko.Character pattern to identify formula te: 수식 텍스트를 식별할 문자 패턴 (정규 표현식, 변경하지 않는 것이 좋음)
ko.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: 수식이 아닌 줄을 식별하기 위한 IoU 임계값
ko.Put translated pages first in dual mode: 듀얼 모드에서 번역된 페이지를 먼저 표시
ko.Only include translated pages in the out: 출력 PDF 에 번역된 페이지만 포함하세요.
ko.Split threshold factor for short lines: 짧은 줄에 대한 분할 임계값 계수
ko.Most API providers provide this paramete: 대부분의 API 제공업체는 이 매개변수를 제공합니다. 예를 들어 OpenAI GPT-4 의 경우 500 RPM 입니다.
ko.Skip formula offset calculation during p: 처리 중 수식 오프셋 계산 건너뛰기
ko.RPC service for document layout analysis: 문서 레이아웃 분석을 위한 RPC 서비스 (선택 사항)
ko.Force split short lines into different p: 짧은 줄을 강제로 다른 단락으로 분할
ko.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: PDF 양면 인쇄 시 번갈아 사용
ko.Handle alternating line numbers and text: 줄 번호가 있는 문서에서 번호와 텍스트 단락을 번갈아 처리하기
ko.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: 설정하지 않거나 0 으로 설정할 경우 QPS 가 작업자 수로 사용됩니다
ko.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR 우회 방법 (실험적, 백엔드에서 '스캔된 문서 감지 건너뛰기' 자동 활성화됨)
ko.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: 수식 텍스트를 식별하기 위한 글꼴 패턴 (정규식, 변경 비권장)
ko.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
ko.Protection threshold for figures and tab: 그림 및 표 보호 임계값 (그림/표 내부의 선은 처리되지 않음)
ko.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: 단락 영역 내에서 수식이 아닌 줄 제거
ko.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: API 제공자에 가장 적합한 속도 제한 모드를 선택하세요. '변환' 버튼을 클릭하면 시스템이 RPM 또는 동시 요청 속도 제한 값을 QPS 및 Pool Max Workers 로 자동 변환합니다.

ru.Character pattern to identify formula te: Шаблон символов для определения текста формулы (regex, не рекомендуется изменять)
ru.Force split short lines into different p: Принудительно разделять короткие строки на разные абзацы
ru.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Повысить совместимость (автоматически включает skip_clean и disable_rich_text)
ru.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Порог IoU для определения строк без формул
ru.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Шаблон шрифта для распознавания формул (регулярное выражение, не рекомендуется изменять)
ru.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Автоматически включать обходное решение для OCR (включить автоматическое обходное решение для сильно сканированных документов)
ru.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Обрабатывать чередующиеся номера строк и текстовые абзацы в документах с нумерацией строк
ru.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Если значение не задано или равно 0, в качестве количества рабочих процессов будет использоваться QPS
ru.Most API providers provide this paramete: Большинство API-провайдеров предоставляют этот параметр, например OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
ru.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Порог защиты для рисунков и таблиц (строки внутри рисунков/таблиц обрабатываться не будут)
ru.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Показывать переведённые страницы первыми в двойном режиме
ru.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Удалить строки без формул в пределах абзацев
ru.Primary font family for translated text: Основное семейство шрифтов для переведённого текста
ru.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Обходной путь для OCR (экспериментальный, автоматически отключит проверку сканированных изображений в бэкенде)
ru.Effective only when a page range is spec: Действительно только при указании диапазона страниц.
ru.RPC service for document layout analysis: Сервис RPC для анализа структуры документа (опционально)
ru.Split threshold factor for short lines: Коэффициент порога разделения для коротких строк
ru.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Пропустить расчет смещения формулы во время обработки
ru.Only include translated pages in the out: Включать в выходной PDF только переведенные страницы.
ru.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
ru.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Использовать чередующиеся страницы для двойного PDF
ru.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Максимальное количество страниц на часть (для автоматического разделения перевода, 0 означает без ограничений)
ru.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Выберите режим ограничения скорости, который лучше всего подходит для вашего API-провайдера. Система автоматически преобразует значения ограничения скорости RPM или количества одновременных запросов в QPS и максимальное количество рабочих процессов (Pool Max Workers) при нажатии кнопки «Перевести».

es.Force split short lines into different p: Forzar la división de líneas cortas en párrafos diferentes
es.Character pattern to identify formula te: Patrón de caracteres para identificar texto de fórmulas (regex, no se recomienda cambiar)
es.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Desactivar la traducción de texto enriquecido (puede mejorar la compatibilidad)
es.Number of requests sent per second: Número de solicitudes enviadas por segundo
es.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Patrón de fuente para identificar texto de fórmulas (expresión regular, no se recomienda cambiar)
es.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Número máximo de solicitudes procesadas simultáneamente
es.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Umbral de IoU para identificar líneas que no son fórmulas
es.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Manejar números de línea alternos y párrafos de texto en documentos con numeración de líneas
es.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efectivo solo cuando se especifica un rango de páginas.
es.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Máximo de páginas por parte (para traducción automática dividida, 0 significa sin límite)
es.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Mostrar las páginas traducidas primero en modo dual
es.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Activar automáticamente solución alternativa de OCR (habilitar solución automática de OCR para documentos muy escaneados)
es.Only include translated pages in the out: Incluir solo las páginas traducidas en el PDF de salida.
es.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Si no se establece o se establece en 0, se utilizará QPS como el número de trabajadores.
es.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Umbral IoU para líneas no formuladas
es.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Mejorar compatibilidad (habilita automáticamente skip_clean y disable_rich_text)
es.Remove non-formula lines: Eliminar líneas que no son fórmulas
es.RPC service for document layout analysis: Servicio RPC para análisis de diseño de documentos (opcional)
es.Minimum text length to translate: Longitud mínima del texto para traducir
es.Free translation service provided by [Si: Servicio de traducción gratuito proporcionado por [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
es.Split threshold factor for short lines: Factor de umbral de división para líneas cortas
es.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Umbral de protección para figuras y tablas (las líneas dentro de figuras/tablas no serán procesadas)
es.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Eliminar líneas que no son fórmulas dentro de áreas de párrafo
es.Skip formula offset calculation: Omitir cálculo de desplazamiento de fórmula
es.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Omitir el cálculo de desplazamiento de fórmulas durante el procesamiento
es.Most API providers provide this paramete: La mayoría de los proveedores de API proporcionan este parámetro, como OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
es.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Solución alternativa de OCR (experimental, activará automáticamente Omitir detección de escaneados en el backend)
es.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usar páginas alternas para PDF dual
es.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
es.Primary font family for translated text: Familia de fuente principal para el texto traducido
es.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Selecciona el modo de límite de tasa que mejor se adapte a tu proveedor de API. El sistema convertirá automáticamente los valores de limitación de tasa de RPM o Solicitudes Simultáneas a QPS y Máximo de Trabajadores en Grupo cuando hagas clic en el botón Traducir

fr.Character pattern to identify formula te: Motif de caractères pour identifier le texte de formule (regex, déconseillé de modifier)
fr.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Améliorer la compatibilité (active automatiquement skip_clean et disable_rich_text)
fr.Force split short lines into different p: Forcer la séparation des lignes courtes en paragraphes distincts
fr.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Seuil d'IoU pour identifier les lignes non-formules
fr.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Activer automatiquement le contournement OCR (active le contournement automatique de l'OCR pour les documents fortement numérisés)
fr.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Motif de police pour identifier le texte des formules (regex, déconseillé de modifier)
fr.Only include translated pages in the out: Inclure uniquement les pages traduites dans le PDF de sortie.
fr.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Désactiver la traduction en texte enrichi (peut améliorer la compatibilité)
fr.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efficace uniquement lorsqu'une plage de pages est spécifiée.
fr.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Placer les pages traduites en premier en mode double
fr.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Nombre maximum de requêtes traitées simultanément
fr.Number of requests sent per second: Nombre de requêtes envoyées par seconde
fr.Most API providers provide this paramete: La plupart des fournisseurs d'API fournissent ce paramètre, comme OpenAI GPT-4 : 500 RPM
fr.Primary font family for translated text: Famille de polices principale pour le texte traduit
fr.RPC service for document layout analysis: Service RPC pour l'analyse de la mise en page des documents (optionnel)
fr.Skip formula offset calculation: Passer le calcul du décalage de formule
fr.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Si non défini ou défini sur 0, le QPS sera utilisé comme nombre de workers.
fr.Pool Max Workers: Nombre maximal de workers du pool
fr.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Seuil d'IoU pour les lignes non formulées
fr.Free translation service provided by [Si: Service de traduction gratuit proposé par [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
fr.Split threshold factor for short lines: Facteur de seuil de division pour les lignes courtes
fr.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Solution de contournement OCR (expérimental, activera automatiquement Ignorer la détection des documents scannés en arrière-plan)
fr.Minimum text length to translate: Longueur minimale du texte à traduire
fr.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Passer le calcul du décalage de formule pendant le traitement
fr.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Gérer les numéros de ligne alternés et les paragraphes de texte dans les documents avec numéros de ligne
fr.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
fr.Skip clean (maybe improve compatibility): Passer le nettoyage (peut améliorer la compatibilité)
fr.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Utiliser des pages alternées pour un PDF double
fr.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Nombre maximum de pages par partie (pour la tradivision automatique, 0 signifie sans limite)
fr.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Seuil de protection pour les figures et tableaux (les lignes à l'intérieur des figures/tableaux ne seront pas traitées)
fr.Merge alternating line numbers: Fusionner les numéros de ligne alternés
fr.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Supprimer les lignes non-formules dans les zones de paragraphe
fr.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Sélectionnez le mode de limitation de débit qui convient le mieux à votre fournisseur d'API. Le système convertira automatiquement les valeurs de limitation de débit (RPM ou requêtes simultanées) en QPS et Pool Max Workers lorsque vous cliquerez sur le bouton Traduire.

de.Effective only when a page range is spec: Nur wirksam, wenn ein Seitenbereich angegeben ist.
de.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Schriftmuster zur Erkennung von Formeltext (Regex, Änderung nicht empfohlen)
de.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Automatische OCR-Umgehung aktivieren (automatische OCR-Umgehung für stark gescannte Dokumente aktivieren)
de.Force split short lines into different p: Kurze Zeilen zwangsweise in verschiedene Absätze aufteilen
de.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: IoU-Schwellenwert für die Identifizierung von Nicht-Formel-Zeilen
de.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Übersetzte Seiten im Dual-Modus zuerst anzeigen
de.Most API providers provide this paramete: Die meisten API-Anbieter bieten diesen Parameter an, z. B. OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
de.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Wenn nicht gesetzt oder auf 0 gesetzt, wird QPS als Anzahl der Worker verwendet.
de.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Kompatibilität verbessern (aktiviert automatisch skip_clean und disable_rich_text)
de.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Umgang mit wechselnden Zeilennummern und Textabsätzen in Dokumenten mit Zeilennummern
de.Character pattern to identify formula te: Zeichenmuster zur Identifizierung von Formeltext (Regex, Änderung nicht empfohlen)
de.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Verwenden Sie abwechselnde Seiten für doppelseitiges PDF
de.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Schwellenwert für den Schutz von Abbildungen und Tabellen (Zeilen innerhalb von Abbildungen/Tabellen werden nicht verarbeitet)
de.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
de.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Maximale Seiten pro Teil (für automatische Teilung der Übersetzung, 0 bedeutet keine Begrenzung)
de.Only include translated pages in the out: Nur übersetzte Seiten in die PDF-Ausgabe aufnehmen.
de.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: OCR-Workaround (experimentell, aktiviert automatisch 'Gescannte Dokumente überspringen' im Backend)
de.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Wählen Sie den Ratenbegrenzungsmodus, der am besten zu Ihrem API-Anbieter passt. Das System konvertiert automatisch die Ratenbegrenzungswerte von RPM oder gleichzeitigen Anfragen in QPS und Pool Max Workers, wenn Sie auf die Schaltfläche 'Übersetzen' klicken.

it.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Migliora la compatibilità (abilita automaticamente skip_clean e disable_rich_text)
it.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Numero massimo di richieste elaborate contemporaneamente
it.Force split short lines into different p: Forza la divisione delle righe brevi in paragrafi diversi
it.Character pattern to identify formula te: Schema di caratteri per identificare il testo della formula (regex, non è consigliato modificarlo)
it.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efficace solo quando è specificato un intervallo di pagine.
it.Number of requests sent per second: Numero di richieste inviate al secondo
it.Minimum text length to translate: Lunghezza minima del testo da tradurre
it.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Numero massimo di pagine per parte (per la traduzione con divisione automatica, 0 significa nessun limite)
it.Primary font family for translated text: Famiglia di font principale per il testo tradotto
it.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Abilita automaticamente la soluzione alternativa OCR (attiva la soluzione automatica OCR per documenti fortemente scansionati)
it.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Modello di carattere per identificare il testo della formula (regex, non è consigliato modificarlo)
it.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Gestire numeri di riga alternati e paragrafi di testo in documenti con numeri di riga
it.Skip formula offset calculation: Salta il calcolo dello scostamento della formula
it.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Disabilita la traduzione del testo formattato (potrebbe migliorare la compatibilità)
it.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Soglia di protezione per figure e tabelle (le righe all'interno di figure/tabelle non verranno elaborate)
it.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Rimuovi le righe non formule all'interno delle aree di paragrafo
it.Only include translated pages in the out: Includi solo le pagine tradotte nel PDF di output.
it.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usa pagine alternate per PDF dual
it.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Se non impostato o impostato a 0, verrà utilizzato il QPS come numero di worker
it.Pool Max Workers: Numero Massimo di Worker nel Pool
it.Most API providers provide this paramete: La maggior parte dei fornitori di API forniscono questo parametro, come OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
it.RPC service for document layout analysis: Servizio RPC per l'analisi del layout dei documenti (opzionale)
it.Free translation service provided by [Si: Servizio di traduzione gratuito offerto da [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
it.Split threshold factor for short lines: Fattore di soglia di divisione per linee brevi
it.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Metti le pagine tradotte in primo piano in modalità duale
it.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Soluzione alternativa OCR (sperimentale, abiliterà automaticamente Salta rilevamento scansioni nel backend)
it.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Salta il calcolo dell'offset della formula durante l'elaborazione
it.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
it.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Seleziona la modalità di limitazione della frequenza più adatta al tuo provider API, il sistema convertirà automaticamente i valori di limitazione RPM o Richieste Concurrenti in QPS e Pool Max Workers quando clicchi il pulsante Traduci
it.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Soglia IoU per identificare le righe non formule
it.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Soglia IoU per linee non formule

pt.Character pattern to identify formula te: Padrão de caracteres para identificar texto de fórmula (regex, não recomendado alterar)
pt.Enhance compatibility (auto-enables skip: Melhorar compatibilidade (ativa automaticamente skip_clean e disable_rich_text)
pt.Disable rich text translation (maybe imp: Desativar tradução de texto rico (pode melhorar a compatibilidade)
pt.Effective only when a page range is spec: Efetivo apenas quando um intervalo de páginas é especificado.
pt.Font pattern to identify formula text (r: Padrão de fonte para identificar texto de fórmula (regex, não recomendado alterar)
pt.Free translation service provided by [Si: Serviço de tradução gratuito fornecido por [SiliconFlow](https://siliconflow.cn)
pt.Minimum text length to translate: Comprimento mínimo do texto para traduzir
pt.If not set or set to 0, QPS will be used: Se não for definido ou definido como 0, o QPS será usado como o número de workers
pt.Handle alternating line numbers and text: Lidar com números de linha alternados e parágrafos de texto em documentos com numeração de linhas
pt.Maximum number of requests processed sim: Número máximo de solicitações processadas simultaneamente
pt.RPC service for document layout analysis: Serviço RPC para análise de layout de documentos (opcional)
pt.Only include translated pages in the out: Incluir apenas páginas traduzidas no PDF de saída.
pt.Most API providers provide this paramete: A maioria dos provedores de API fornecem esse parâmetro, como OpenAI GPT-4: 500 RPM
pt.Non-formula line IoU threshold: Limiar de IoU para linha não-formulada
pt.Force split short lines into different p: Forçar a divisão de linhas curtas em parágrafos diferentes
pt.Put translated pages first in dual mode: Colocar páginas traduzidas primeiro no modo duplo
pt.Auto enable OCR workaround (enable autom: Ativar automaticamente solução alternativa de OCR (habilitar solução alternativa automática de OCR para documentos muito digitalizados)
pt.Skip formula offset calculation during p: Pular cálculo de deslocamento de fórmula durante o processamento
pt.IoU threshold for identifying non-formul: Limiar de IoU para identificar linhas não fórmulas
pt.Number of requests sent per second: Número de solicitações enviadas por segundo
pt.Split threshold factor for short lines: Fator de limite de divisão para linhas curtas
pt.Primary font family for translated text: Família de fonte principal para texto traduzido
pt.OCR workaround (experimental, will auto: Solução alternativa de OCR (experimental, ativará automaticamente a opção Pular detecção de digitalizado no backend)
pt.Skip formula offset calculation: Pular cálculo de deslocamento da fórmula
pt.Maximum pages per part (for auto-split t: Máximo de páginas por parte (para tradução automática dividida, 0 significa sem limite)
pt.Use alternating pages for dual PDF: Usar páginas alternadas para PDF duplo
pt.Protection threshold for figures and tab: Limiar de proteção para figuras e tabelas (linhas dentro de figuras/tabelas não serão processadas)
pt.Remove non-formula lines within paragrap: Remover linhas que não são fórmulas dentro de áreas de parágrafo
pt.e.g. /no_think You are a professional, a: e.g. /no_think You are a professional, authentic machine translation engine.
pt.Select the rate limit mode that best sui: Selecione o modo de limite de taxa que melhor se adapta ao seu provedor de API. O sistema converterá automaticamente os valores de limitação de taxa de RPM ou Solicitações Simultâneas para QPS e Pool Max Workers quando você clicar no botão Traduzir
